actions.name: Multiattack
actions.description: The ape makes two fist attacks.

actions.name: Fist
actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +9 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 22 (3d10 + 6) bludgeoning damage.

actions.name: Rock
actions.description: Ranged Weapon Attack: +9 to hit, range 50/100 ft., one target. Hit: 30 (7d6 + 6) bludgeoning damage.
